short_summary: Request for Standing Offer for Fire Safety and Rescue Equipment
description: The department is seeking tenders to establish a National Master Standing Offer (NMSO) for the supply of Fire, Safety and Rescue Equipment, services for the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
full_summary:
# Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)
## Proposal Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) in Canada invites interested suppliers to participate in a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Fire, Safety and Rescue Equipment. This bilateral tender will be conducted under the Canadian Government’s procurement rules.

### Contract Details
| Category | Description |
| --- | --- |
| UNSPSC | Fall protection and rescue equipment (46182300) |
| UNSPSC | Fire fighting equipment (46191600) |

### Standing Offer Considerations

* Term duration: 1 year renewable for up to 3 additional years
* Contract duration: the contract will terminate after 1 year from effective date and the Solicitor will give notice to the Supplier one year prior to contract expiration which is January 27, 2025 
* Which minimized economic practicable solicit vocations Regions, which include/delete several regions, see cand only Canada business anti-F
                
### Tenders
- Closing Date: Thursday, March 21, 2024 at 2:00 pm (Eastern Standard Time)
- Solicitation Reference: WS4445207274
- Contract Reference: 4445305789
- Attachment length:68 Pages

### Selection and Evaluation Criteria

* The selection will be based on the lowest price
* Where the prices are identical, the evaluation criterion of past performance shall be used to differentiate the bids on a point-per-point basis

### Proposal Directions
A Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) is issued for all suppliers who are eligible, provide operating document and will validate the Apt respecting to that specified header.
